original_text:
Micro Knights
La slot Micro Knights è di ELK Studios e i basa una divertente trama medioevale sotto forma di cartoon con una grafica che ricorda quella per PC.  Si gioca su una griglia 7×7, puntando da 0,10€ fino a 100,00€ a round su tutti i dispositivi. Sono presenti 6 funzionalità di bandiera che rimuovono le righe, aggiungono jolly, cancellano simboli di basso valore e ti regalano simboli di dimensioni extra. Questo vale anche per la funzione di Bonus Game di Free Drops. L’RTP è del 96% e puoi vincere fino a 2.500 x puntata per ogni giro / caduta.
Tema e simboli speciali di Micro Knights
I simboli includono:

pozzi,
bersagli,
funghi,
conigli,
rane,
capre
tori – Questo è il simbolo più gratificante che ti può dare 250 volte la puntata totale
il calice d’oro è il simbolo jolly che sostituisce tutti i simboli tranne lo scatter bonus.

Essendo uno slot Cluster Pays, le combinazioni vincenti si formano ottenendo 5 o più simboli corrispondenti in posizioni adiacenti che devono collegarsi verticalmente o orizzontalmente. Quando ottieni una vittoria, si attiverà una valanga e i cluster vincenti verranno rimossi per fare spazio ai nuovi simboli di atterrare, portando vittorie consecutive.
Occhio alle file di simboli!
Quando si forma una vincita, una fila di simboli viene messa in coda sempre che non ci siano più combinazioni vincenti. La riga dove possono essere rimossi i simboli è indicata dal Cavaliere della Carica. I simboli nella coda vengono utilizzati da sinistra a destra e si collegano con le icone sulla griglia per formare i cluster. I simboli nella coda possono contribuire a diversi cluster nello stesso drop: essi rimarranno nella coda finché non faranno parte di un cluster vincente.
Caratteristiche della bandiera
Ogni simbolo in un cluster vincente si aggiunge al misuratore a destra della griglia del simbolo: quando il misuratore è pieno, si attiva una funzione di bandiera selezionata casualmente, mentre il misuratore viene ripristinato:

Funzione Coda potenziata: tutti i simboli nella coda possono connettersi con i simboli sulla griglia per formare cluster vincenti
Funzione di addebito: tra 2 e 5 righe della griglia vengono spostate nella coda
Funzione di addebito epico: tutte le righe della griglia vengono spostate nella coda
Funzione jolly extra: tra 3 e 6 simboli jolly vengono posizionati casualmente sulla griglia
Funzione Inferno: tutti i simboli di basso valore vengono rimossi dalla griglia
Funzione Super Size: una dimensione grande, 2×2, 3×3 o 4×4, viene aggiunta casualmente alla griglia per darti un cluster vincente.

Funzione di gioco bonus gratuito
Cerca il simbolo della corona poiché questo è lo scatter bonus – 3 di loro attiveranno la funzione di Bonus Game di Free Drops. Con 5 drop / giri gratuiti assegnati, puoi riattivare la funzione per arrivare a 10. A partire da un contatore e una coda vuoti, puoi beneficiare di tutte le funzionalità di bandiera descritte sopra.
I miei pensieri finali su Micro Knights
La slot Micro Knights è colorata e divertente: la chiave è ottenere vittorie consecutive che si aggiungono alla coda in modo che vengano attivate le caratteristiche di bandiera. La migliore funzione è la Super Size poiché un simbolo 4×4 comporterà un pagamento garantito.

raw_translation.response:
Micro Knights by ELK Studios is a medieval-themed cartoon slot game with PC-like graphics. This thrilling game is played on a 7x7 grid, where players can bet from €0.10 to €100.00 per round on any device. There are six flag features that remove rows, add wilds, delete low-value symbols, and gift you with extra-sized symbols, including the Free Drops Bonus Game.

As an experienced gambler, you should know that the RTP is 96%, and you can win up to 2,500x your stake per spin/drop. The symbols include wells, targets, mushrooms, rabbits, frogs, goats, and the most rewarding symbol, the bull, which gives 250 times the total bet. The golden chalice is the wild symbol that replaces all symbols except the bonus scatter.

Since it's a Cluster Pays slot, winning combinations are formed by obtaining 5 or more matching symbols in adjacent positions that must connect vertically or horizontally. When you get a win, a cascade is activated, and the winning clusters are removed to make room for new symbols to land, bringing consecutive wins.

Keep an eye on the queued symbol rows! When a win is formed, a row of symbols is queued, provided there are no more winning combinations. The row where symbols can be removed is indicated by the Charging Knight. The symbols in the queue are used from left to right and connect with the icons on the grid to form the clusters. The symbols in the queue can contribute to different clusters on the same drop and remain in the queue until they are part of a winning cluster.

For experienced gamblers, the game's flag features are essential to making big wins. Each winning cluster symbol adds to the meter on the right side of the symbol grid. When the meter is full, a randomly selected flag feature is activated, and the meter is reset. The flag features are: 

- Enhanced Queue feature: all symbols in the queue can connect with the symbols on the grid to form winning clusters.
- Charge feature: 2 to 5 rows of the grid are moved to the queue.
- Epic Charge feature: All rows of the grid are moved to the queue.
- Extra Wild feature: 3 to 6 wild symbols are randomly placed on the grid. 
- Inferno feature: all low-value symbols are removed from the grid.
- Super Size feature: a large size, 2x2, 3x3, or 4x4, is randomly added to the grid to give you a winning cluster.

The Free Drops Bonus Game feature is triggered by getting three crown symbols, and with five free drops/spins awarded, you can reactivate the feature to get up to ten. Starting with an empty counter and queue, you can benefit from all the flag features described above.

Overall, Micro Knights is a colorful and exciting game that rewards consecutive wins to activate flag features. As an experienced gambler, you should keep your sights set on the Super Size feature for the best chance at a guaranteed payout.

Review: Micro Knights
ELK Studios' Micro Knights slot game has a fun medieval theme in the form of a cartoon, with graphics that resemble those for PC. It's played on a 7x7 grid, with bets ranging from €0.10 up to €100.00 per round on all devices. There are six banner features that remove rows, add wilds, remove low-value symbols, and give you extra symbols. This also applies to the Free Drops Bonus Game feature. The RTP is 96% and you can win up to 2,500x your bet for each spin/drop.

Theme and special symbols of Micro Knights
Symbols include:

wells,
targets,
mushrooms,
rabbits,
frogs,
goats
bulls - This is the most rewarding symbol that can give you 250 times the total bet.
the golden chalice is the wild symbol that replaces all symbols except the bonus scatter.

Being a Cluster Pays slot, winning combinations are formed by getting 5 or more matching symbols in adjacent positions that must connect vertically or horizontally. When you get a win, a cascade will be triggered and winning clusters will be removed to make way for new symbols to land, bringing consecutive wins.
Watch out for symbol queues!
When a win is formed, a line of symbols is queued up as long as there are no more winning combinations. The row where symbols can be removed is indicated by the Charging Knight. Symbols in the queue are used from left to right and connect with icons on the grid to form clusters. Symbols in the queue can contribute to multiple clusters in the same drop: they will remain in the queue until they are part of a winning cluster.

Banner features
Each symbol in a winning cluster is added to the symbol grid on the right: When the grid is full, a randomly selected banner feature is activated, while the grid is reset:

Enhanced Queue feature: All symbols in the queue can connect with symbols on the grid to form winning clusters.
Charge feature: Between 2 and 5 rows on the grid are moved to the queue.
Epic Charge feature: All rows of the grid are moved to the queue.
Extra Wild feature: Between 3 and 6 wild symbols are randomly placed on the grid.
Inferno feature: all low-value symbols are removed from the grid.
Super Size feature: A large size, 2x2, 3x3, or 4x4, is randomly added to the grid to give you a winning cluster.

Free bonus game feature
Look for the crown symbol as this is the bonus scatter - 3 of them will activate the Free Drops Bonus Game feature. With 5 free drops/spins assigned, you can reactivate the feature to reach 10. Starting from an empty counter and queue, you can benefit from all of the banner features described above.

My final thoughts on Micro Knights
The Micro Knights slot game is colorful and fun: the key is to get consecutive wins that add to the queue so that banner features are activated. The best feature is Super Size because a 4x4 symbol will result in a guaranteed payout.

Review:
 
Gameplay mechanics

Micro Knights is a cluster pays slot game that is played on a 7x7 grid. Winning combinations are formed by getting 5 or more matching symbols in adjacent positions that must connect vertically or horizontally. When you get a win, a cascade will be triggered and winning clusters will be removed to make way for new symbols to land, bringing consecutive wins.

Bonus features

Micro Knights has six banner features that activate when the symbol grid on the right is full, and the grid is reset. The Enhanced Queue feature allows all symbols in the queue to connect with symbols on the grid to form winning clusters. The Charge feature moves between 2 and 5 rows on the grid to the queue. The Epic Charge feature moves all rows of the grid to the queue. The Extra Wild feature adds between 3 and 6 randomly placed wild symbols on the grid. The Inferno feature removes all low-value symbols from the grid. The Super Size feature adds a large size, 2x2, 3x3, or 4x4, randomly to the grid to give you a winning cluster. Additionally, the Crown symbol is the bonus scatter that activates the Free Drops Bonus Game feature when three of them appear. Five free drops or spins are assigned, and you can reactivate the feature to reach 10. Starting from an empty counter and queue, you can benefit from all the banner features.

Graphics and theme

Micro Knights has a fun medieval theme in the form of a cartoon, with graphics that resemble those for PC. The symbols include wells, targets, mushrooms, rabbits, frogs, goats, and the most rewarding symbol - bulls that can give you 250 times the total bet. The golden chalice is the wild symbol that replaces all symbols except the bonus scatter.

Bet range and payout

Micro Knights accepts bets ranging from €0.10 up to €100.00 per round on all devices. The RTP is 96%, and you can win up to 2,500x your bet for each spin/drop. To win the maximum payout, you must land the most rewarding symbol - bulls - on a full screen during one of the banner features.

Overall impression

Micro Knights is a colorful and fun cluster pays slot game that features six banner features that are activated when the grid on the right is full, and it is reset. The game has a medieval theme and fun symbols, such as wells, targets, and frogs. The most rewarding symbol is the bull that can give you 250 times the total bet. The RTP is 96%, and you can win up to 2,500x your bet for each spin/drop. The Super Size feature is the best feature to land, as it adds a large size, 2x2, 3x3, or 4x4, randomly to the grid to give you a guaranteed payout. Overall, Micro Knights is an excellent slot game that will keep you entertained and engaged.
